column1: i used to cry when my dad chopped onions. i miss onions, he was a good dog.
column3: Refers to the vegetable that causes tears when chopped and also a term of endearment for a pet.
column4: Onions contain sulfur compounds that can irritate the eyes and cause tears.
column5: I miss onions as a beloved pet name for my dog.

column1: Why cant indiana jones find a long lasting relationship? bad dates.
column3: Refers to the fruit as well as romantic outings.
column4: Dates are high in natural sugars and are often used in healthy recipes.
column5: The dates I had last week were just not compatible.

column1: Why do bakers start working so early in the morning? because they knead dough.
column3: Refers to the action of working with dough and also implies a need for something.
column4: Bakers need to knead dough to prepare baked goods.
column5: I have a strong need for creativity in my life right now.

column1: What country does fried fish swim in? greece!
column3: Refers to the country and alludes to cooking with grease.
column4: Greece is known for its rich history and beautiful landscapes.
column5: The car began to run poorly because it was low on grease.

column1: What did one tampon say to the other? nothing, they were both stuck up bitches.
column3: Refers to the feminine hygiene product and suggests being snobbish.
column4: Tampons are commonly used during menstruation for hygiene.
column5: Being a tampon means you play an important role in womens health.
